    Improve the documentation of the 'length()' and 'sqrLength()' functions

commit ade58d4589f67e22e64f2ac603fb024e7cef2ff2
Author: Denis Demidov <dennis.demidov@gmail.com>
Date:   Mon Apr 24 09:55:57 2017 +0300

    Export CMake package configuration
    
    So that users may include blaze simply by doing
    
      find_package(blaze)
    
    in their cmake scripts. The updated CMakeLists.txt installs blaze
    directory into ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/include, and the package configuration files
    into ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/share/blaze/cmake.
    
    And even without installation, export(PACKAGE blaze) command registers
    the current build tree in the user package registry, so that
    `find_package(blaze)` works as soon as a local copy of blaze been
    configured.
